dcterms:creator: Michael Roth
Talita Anthonio
Anna Sauer
dcterms:description: The dataset consists of instructional texts with ambiguous content, where the task is to identify plausible clarifications of implicit and underspecified phrases. It is structured as a CLOZE task, requiring the system to determine the plausibility of sequences based on given contexts and filler options.
dcterms:title: SemEval-2022 Task 7
